front.title: Bootstrap Control Function mechanism for Mobile IPv6 Bootstrap

abstract.t: This document specifies a mechanism for Mobile IPv6 bootstrap procedure. By making a extension of MIP6 specification and using IKE to guarantee its security, this mechanism bring into a new component BCF(Bootstrap Control Function) to handle MN¡¯s bootstrap procedure between MN and multiple HAs. Two new bootstrap messages Init and Ack has been defined to support bootstrap procedure.
